GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.18.8
GSD.description:
drm/msm/mdp4: Fix refcount leak in mdp4_modeset_init_intf

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.8 by commit d607da76fd2b1cf1d377af9d9b7c6f8fecbb0e1d, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 86418f90a4c1a0073db65d8a1e2bf94421117a60. For more details please see the references link.
